segments.text: Steve , thanks for looking after Johnny .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was a pleasure , Mrs . Robinson .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And this kitchen is so clean . Did you help Johnny with that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I helped break ... I mean WASH ... all the dishes !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . And the garbage , too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , uh , it's outside . Listen , I really have to be going now .
segments.speaker: S2
